TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit InterfaceQueuingAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class InterfaceQueuingAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class InterfaceQueuingAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 为标记的接口启用队列支持。

span.span: Enables queuing support for the marked interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对此接口的调用将使用消息队列进行排队。Calls on this interface will be queued using Message Queuing. 若要将接口标记为已排队，请使用以下语法将此特性应用于接口： `[InterfaceQueuing]` 。To mark an interface as queued, apply this attribute to the interface using the following syntax: `[InterfaceQueuing]`. 排队接口的成员方法必须满足排队方法调用的要求，例如无 `out` 或 `ref` 参数。The member methods of a queued interface must fulfill the requirements for queued method calls, such as having no `out` or `ref` parameters. 有关使用特性的详细信息，请参阅 [特性](/dotnet/standard/attributes/)。For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](/dotnet/standard/attributes/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 `InterfaceQueuingAttribute` 特性。The following code example shows how to use the `InterfaceQueuingAttribute` attribute. [!code-cpp[System.EnterpriseServices.QueuedComponents#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.EnterpriseServices.QueuedComponents/CPP/queuedcomponent.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.EnterpriseServices.QueuedComponents#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.EnterpriseServices.QueuedComponents/CS/queuedcomponent.cs#2)] 下面的代码示例演示如何通过使用属性将 COM + 应用程序标记为在编译时排队 `ApplicationQueuing` ，并通过将设置 `QueueListenerEnabled` 为 true 来启用 com + 侦听器The following code example shows how to mark a COM+ application as queued at compile time by using the `ApplicationQueuing` attribute, and enable the COM+ listener by setting the `QueueListenerEnabled` to true [!code-cpp[System.EnterpriseServices.QueuedComponents#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.EnterpriseServices.QueuedComponents/CPP/queuedcomponent.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.EnterpriseServices.QueuedComponents#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.EnterpriseServices.QueuedComponents/CS/queuedcomponent.cs#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 `BindToMoniker` 来运行排队的名字对象，以获取记录器的实例，调用将记录的方法，并强制释放记录器对象，以将消息发送到队列。The following code example shows how to use `BindToMoniker` to run the queued moniker, to get an instance of the recorder, call the method that will be recorded, and force the release of the recorder object, to send the message to the queue. [!code-cpp[System.EnterpriseServices.QueuedComponents#0](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.EnterpriseServices.QueuedComponents/CPP/queuedcomponentclientclass.cpp#0)] [!code-csharp[System.EnterpriseServices.QueuedComponents#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.EnterpriseServices.QueuedComponents/CS/queuedcomponentclientclass.cs#0)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，并启用队列支持。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, enabling queuing support.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性对应于 `Queuing-Enabled` COM + 中的属性。This property corresponds to the `Queuing-Enabled` property in COM+.
